review: We have the Fire TV downstairs, and wanted the same functionality in the master.  However, that is a wall mount with a very clean install.Enter Fire TV Stick.  I believe I received this at discount as we are prime members.It is obviously not as fast as the Fire TV, and it does NOT have Voice Search, but it is a great unit.very easy setup, you are already to go!  an essential for Prime folks

review: I'm so glad I only paid $20 for this. It's a piece of crap. I have a strong Wi-Fi signal and my other devices have no trouble, but this thing freezes and buffers and takes forever to do anything. It's especially bad when watching Netflix or using the Amazon music app. It just took 7 minutes to play a 4 minute song because it plays maybe 6 notes before it freezes and says it's loading. I am really disappointed with it and can't recommend it to anyone.
